name: Rookite
description: The Blade Shield Pokémon. Rookite protects groups of pawniards from predators both by deflecting attacks with its shield and by crushing its foes with it.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.
